meanings.sent1: The morning fog would bemist the view of the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The mist from the waterfall bemisted the entire valley.

meanings.sent4: Her tears seemed to bemist the memories of their happy times together.
meanings.sent5: The dense fog bemisted the path, making it hard to see.
